languages.text: {n}Идира хохочет, но в смехе слышны визгливые нотки.{/n} "Ну раз дверь открылась, значит, кто-то планирует зайти, не так ли? Только хрен им, не выйдет. Уж я-то знаю, как держать свою драгоценную головушку на замке".

traits.locale_text: {n}Идира хохочет, но в смехе слышны визгливые нотки.{/n} "Ну раз дверь открылась, значит, кто-то планирует зайти, не так ли? Только хрен им, не выйдет. Уж я-то знаю, как держать свою драгоценную головушку на замке".

languages.text: {n}Idira chuckles, but there is a shrill, strained quality to her laughter.{/n} "Well, if the door opens, that means somebody's planning to come in, right? But screw them, they're not coming through. Trust me, I know how to keep my valuable head locked up tight."
languages.original_text: {n}Идира хохочет, но в смехе слышны визгливые нотки.{/n} "Ну раз дверь открылась, значит, кто-то планирует зайти, не так ли? Только хрен им, не выйдет. Уж я-то знаю, как держать свою драгоценную головушку на замке".

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira chuckles, but there is a shrill, strained quality to her laughter.{/n} "Well, if the door opens, that means somebody's planning to come in, right? But screw them, they're not coming through. Trust me, I know how to keep my valuable head locked up tight."

{n}Idira chuckles, but there is a shrill, strained quality to her laughter.{/n} "Well, if the door opens, that means somebody's planning to come in, right? But screw them, they're not coming through. Trust me, I know how to keep my valuable head locked up tight."

{n}Idira chuckles, but there is a shrill, strained quality to her laughter.{/n} "Well, if the door opens, that means somebody's planning to come in, right? But screw them, they're not coming through. Trust me, I know how to keep my valuable head locked up tight."

{n}Idira chuckles, but there is a shrill, strained quality to her laughter.{/n} "Well, if the door opens, that means somebody's planning to come in, right? But screw them, they're not coming through. Trust me, I know how to keep my valuable head locked up tight."

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉笑了起来，但她尖锐的笑声中充满了紧张。{/n}“这么说吧，如果门开了，就意味着有什么人打算闯进来，是吧？但去他的吧，我可不会让他们进来。相信我，我知道该如何紧紧锁住我宝贵的脑袋。”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira chuckles, but there is a shrill, strained quality to her laughter.{/n} "Well, if the door opens, that means somebody's planning to come in, right? But screw them, they're not coming through. Trust me, I know how to keep my valuable head locked up tight."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉笑了起来，但她尖锐的笑声中充满了紧张。{/n}“这么说吧，如果门开了，就意味着有什么人打算闯进来，是吧？但去他的吧，我可不会让他们进来。相信我，我知道该如何紧紧锁住我宝贵的脑袋。”

languages.original_text: {n}Idira chuckles, but there is a shrill, strained quality to her laughter.{/n} "Well, if the door opens, that means somebody's planning to come in, right? But screw them, they're not coming through. Trust me, I know how to keep my valuable head locked up tight."

languages.text: {n}Idira se ríe, pero con un tono estridente y forzado.{/n} «Bueno, si la puerta se abre, será que todos quieren entrar, ¿no? Pero que les den, no van a pasar. Créeme, sé cómo mantener mi valiosa cabeza bien cerrada».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira chuckles, but there is a shrill, strained quality to her laughter.{/n} "Well, if the door opens, that means somebody's planning to come in, right? But screw them, they're not coming through. Trust me, I know how to keep my valuable head locked up tight."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira se ríe, pero con un tono estridente y forzado.{/n} «Bueno, si la puerta se abre, será que todos quieren entrar, ¿no? Pero que les den, no van a pasar. Créeme, sé cómo mantener mi valiosa cabeza bien cerrada».

languages.text: {n}イディラは苦笑するが、その笑みはどこかこわばっていた。{/n}「扉が開くってことは、誰かが入ってくるってことでしょ？でも、ふざけないで、彼らは入ってこないわ。信じて、私は自分の貴重な頭をしっかりと閉じ込めておく方法を知っているのだから」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira chuckles, but there is a shrill, strained quality to her laughter.{/n} "Well, if the door opens, that means somebody's planning to come in, right? But screw them, they're not coming through. Trust me, I know how to keep my valuable head locked up tight."

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラは苦笑するが、その笑みはどこかこわばっていた。{/n}「扉が開くってことは、誰かが入ってくるってことでしょ？でも、ふざけないで、彼らは入ってこないわ。信じて、私は自分の貴重な頭をしっかりと閉じ込めておく方法を知っているのだから」

languages.text: {n}Idira lacht auf, doch es ist ein schrilles, angestrengtes Lachen.{/n} "Nun ja, wenn sich die Tür öffnet, gedenkt wohl jemand einzutreten, nicht wahr? Aber die können mich mal, die kommen nicht durch. Glaubt mir, ich weiß, wie ich meinen wertvollen Kopf absperren kann."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira chuckles, but there is a shrill, strained quality to her laughter.{/n} "Well, if the door opens, that means somebody's planning to come in, right? But screw them, they're not coming through. Trust me, I know how to keep my valuable head locked up tight."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira lacht auf, doch es ist ein schrilles, angestrengtes Lachen.{/n} "Nun ja, wenn sich die Tür öffnet, gedenkt wohl jemand einzutreten, nicht wahr? Aber die können mich mal, die kommen nicht durch. Glaubt mir, ich weiß, wie ich meinen wertvollen Kopf absperren kann."

languages.text: {n}Le rire d'Idira est un peu trop perçant pour être naturel.{/n} « Eh bien, si la porte s'ouvre, c'est que quelqu'un compte entrer, non ? Mais qu'ils aillent se faire voir, je ne les laisserai pas passer. Croyez-moi, je sais comment préserver ma précieuse petite tête. »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira chuckles, but there is a shrill, strained quality to her laughter.{/n} "Well, if the door opens, that means somebody's planning to come in, right? But screw them, they're not coming through. Trust me, I know how to keep my valuable head locked up tight."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le rire d'Idira est un peu trop perçant pour être naturel.{/n} « Eh bien, si la porte s'ouvre, c'est que quelqu'un compte entrer, non ? Mais qu'ils aillent se faire voir, je ne les laisserai pas passer. Croyez-moi, je sais comment préserver ma précieuse petite tête. »

languages.text: {n}İdira gülse de kahkahasındaki tiz, gergin ton seziliyor.{/n} "Kapı açılacak olursa birileri içeri girmeyi aklına koymuş demektir, değil mi? Aman, kafana takma bunları. Öyle bir şeyin mümkünatı yok. Kıymetli zihnimi nasıl kilitli tutacağımı iyi bilirim ben."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira chuckles, but there is a shrill, strained quality to her laughter.{/n} "Well, if the door opens, that means somebody's planning to come in, right? But screw them, they're not coming through. Trust me, I know how to keep my valuable head locked up tight."

traits.locale_text: {n}İdira kıkırdasa da kahkahasında kulak tırmalayan, gergin bir ton seziliyor.{/n} "Yani kapı açılırsa birinin içeri girmeye niyeti olduğunu düşünebiliriz, değil mi? Aman, canları cehenneme. Gelecekleri varsa görecekleri de var. Kıymetli zihnimi onlara bir güzel kapamasını bilirim ben, emin ol."
